events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle at an intersection, seeking immediate claim initiation.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and incident details.
An agent specialized in automobile claims was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant.
Customer received formal acknowledgement of their claim with information about the next steps.
Claimant was asked to submit vehicle registration, photos of damage, and police report for assessment.
All requested documents including photos and police report were submitted by the claimant promptly.
Investigation begun by claims team to verify circumstances and evaluate extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of incident details, damage estimate, and liability assessment.
An initial settlement offer was presented to the customer based on damage assessment and policy terms.
Customer provided feedback regarding the settlement offer, requesting clarification on certain charges.
The claim was officially approved after reviewing all documents and customer feedback.
Payment was processed and issued to customerâ€™s account for vehicle repair costs as agreed.
Claim was closed successfully after confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction.
